register.name: NSACR
register.description: When EL3 is implemented and can use AArch32, defines the Non-secure access permissions to Trace, Advanced SIMD and floating-point functionality. Also includes IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED bits that can define Non-secure access permissions for IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED functionality.

bitField.name: NSTRCDIS
bitField.description: Disables Non-secure System register accesses to all implemented trace registers.

bitField.name: NSASEDIS
bitField.description: Disables Non-secure access to the Advanced SIMD functionality.

bitField.name: cp11
bitField.description: The value of this field is ignored. If this field is programmed with a different value to the cp10 field then this field is UNKNOWN on a direct read of the NSACR.

bitField.name: cp10
bitField.description: Enable Non-secure access to the Advanced SIMD and floating-point features.

tcf:enumItem.description: This control has no effect on...
tcf:enumItem.name: This_control_has_no_effect_on

tcf:enumItem.description: Non-secure System register accesses to all implemented trace registers are disabled, meaning...
tcf:enumItem.name: Non_secure_System_register_accesses_to_all_implemented_trace_registers_are_disabled_meaning

tcf:enumItem.description: This control has no effect on...
tcf:enumItem.name: This_control_has_no_effect_on

tcf:enumItem.description: Non-secure access to the Advanced SIMD functionality is disabled, meaning...
tcf:enumItem.name: Non_secure_access_to_the_Advanced_SIMD_functionality_is_disabled_meaning

tcf:enumItem.description: Advanced SIMD and floating-point features can be accessed only from Secure state. Any attempt to access this functionality from Non-secure state is UNDEFINED...
tcf:enumItem.name: Advanced_SIMD_and_floating_point_features_can_be_accessed_only_from_Secure_state

tcf:enumItem.description: Advanced SIMD and floating-point features can be accessed from both Security states.
tcf:enumItem.name: Advanced_SIMD_and_floating_point_features_can_be_accessed_from_both_Security_states
